name: Banana-Date Muffins
author: SHERRY SMITH
summary: A tasty sweet muffin recipe that won't blow your diet. Bananas and dates team up with bran cereal for a tasty breakfast treat. You'll love it!
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Grease a muffin pan with non-stick spray or line with paper muffin liners
Sift together the flour, baking powder, cinnamon and salt; set aside
In a medium bowl, cream together the sugar, margarine and egg with an electric mixer until light and fluffy
Mix in bananas, vanilla, cereal and dates
Blend in dry ingredients until just incorporated
Spoon into prepared muffin cups to about 2/3 full
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean
Cool in pan over a wire rack for at least 10 minutes before removing muffins from the pan
